explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, a man wearing a black baseball cap and a denim vest holds an empty white plate, his eyes looking forward. Behind him is a white curtain, and at the top of the screen, there are black words "Street food be like" on a white background.

[0-4] The man throws the plate in his hand forward, followed by a hand tearing open a huge loaf of bread, revealing the soft inside. The scene then switches to the man, who tears open the huge loaf of bread, revealing the soft bread inside, with a serious expression on his face. Afterward, the scene switches to a white plate, where a slice of golden-brown toast is placed. Then, a hand spreads creamy white sauce evenly on the toast. Subsequently, a hand neatly arranges a few slices of bright red tomato on lettuce, followed by a hand sprinkling white seasoning powder evenly on the tomato slices.

[4-6] The scene then switches to a fryer, where the man uses tongs to pick up a piece of golden and crispy fried chicken. Then, the man places the chicken on the toast covered with lettuce and tomato. Afterward, a hand covers the chicken with slices of golden cheese, and another hand pours creamy white sauce on the cheese. Afterward, another slice of toasted bread covers the cheese, completing a giant chicken burger. Then, a hand places French fries next to the burger.

[6-8] The scene then switches to the man, who is holding the giant burger and fries in his hands and smiling happily. The words "Small Chicken sandwich" appear in black on a white background, followed by the words "0.0001 dollars" and "take it and leave". Finally, the man turns and walks away to the right.
